messages.title: Theresa May backs Kim Caddy
messages.content: Kim Caddy is standing with me to secure strong and stable leadership for our country, and the best Brexit deal possible for our country's future.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for anyone other than Kim Caddy here risks Jeremy Corbyn becoming Prime Minister of this country.

issues.brexitEurope: best Brexit deal possible for our country's future.

endorsements.endorsement: I know Kim is the right person to support us and help improve our local area, where we are offering a real alternative to the falling Labour Council!

I'm voting for Kim Caddy because I know she will hold Lambeth Council to account. With her experience as a Councillor in Wandsworth she knows how to get things done and I want her as a strong voice for Streatham
I'm voting for Kim Caddy because the Conservatives are the only party supporting business. Our community loves our local shops and businesses and they bring jobs to the area

Problems on the trains mean I am often late for work, and sometimes my friends can't even get on the tube at Clapham as it's so busy. I am voting for Kim because I think she will work hard to get these problems fixed
Like Kim, I voted Remain but now I want the best possible deal in Europe – I think Theresa May is the best person to negotiate that deal and the only way to guarantee that is to vote for Kim
